modName: Dragons Speak Instead Of Roaring Skyrim
summary: This mod changes the dragons to speak in there voice instead of roaring at everything Also make sure to check out the video
descriptionHtml:
Dragons Speak Instead Of Roaring

This mod changes the dragons to speak in there voice instead of roaring at everything Also make sure to check out the video

Pretty much the videos will show you what this mod is about check it out

Make sure to endorse in you enjoyed


This works for all dragons
